Reporting Exceptions to Honeycomb with Frontend ObservabilityThere are at least two ways to report error details in OpenTelemetry. Web applications generally place exceptions in trace spans as span events, and mobile applications send exceptions as log messages instead. This article will help you understand which approaches you can use, and how the errors will appear in Honeycomb.
